title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7200.7 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7200.7 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) On or before the first day of April each year, the trustees shall prepare an
annual report of the activities and operations of the fund during the preceding
year. The report shall be transmitted to the Court of Appeals, the Governor, the Legislature and the State Comptroller. (b) The trustees may also issue
periodic reports to the public concerning the activities and procedures of the
fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
7200.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
